name: Spicy Chicken Stir-fry
description: A quick and flavorful stir-fry with a spicy kick.
instructions: Cut chicken breast into bite-sized pieces.
Heat oil in a large skillet or wok over medium-high heat.
Add chicken and cook until browned and cooked through. Remove from pan.
Add broccoli and bell pepper to the pan and stir-fry for 3-5 minutes until tender-crisp.
In a small bowl, whisk together soy sauce, sriracha, grated ginger, and minced garlic.
Return chicken to the pan. Pour sauce over chicken and vegetables, tossing to coat.
Cook for another 1-2 minutes until sauce has thickened slightly.
Serve immediately with rice or noodles.
